body.name: CAYAMA 1000ml Steam Cleaner 2500W High Pressure Steamer for Cleaning,Handheld Steam Cleaner for Home Use,Hardwood Floor Steam Cleaner for Upholstery,Kitchen,Bathroom,Grout and Tile
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 14 hrs
features: 💨💨【Steam Cleaner for Home Use】The high pressure steam cleaner uses a 2500W heater that heats up quickly in 15 seconds, reaching 221°F/105°C.With the hot high pressure steam penetrating into the tiny pores on the surface of objects, the steam cleaning machine can remove the stubborn greasy and deep stains effectively.
💨💨【Large Capacity Water Tank】The portable steam cleaner can be used continuously for about 1 hour, no need to add water frequently, improving your cleaning work efficiency.

💨💨【Applies to Multiple Scenarios】This home steam cleaner has 6 levels of different intensities that can be adjusted. The package comes with 3 different brush heads and an 8.6 in extension bar to easily meet various daily cleaning needs. The steam cleaner can be widely used in kitchen, bathroom and living room such as cleaning range hoods, stoves, refrigerator, tub, upholstery, grout, tile, window, couch, floors, carpet, toys, grill, car detailing, etc.

💨💨【Protable Steam Cleaner】Steam Cleaner so easy to carry around with its handheld design. No lugging around a big, bulky cleaner. This thing is portable and efficient. It’s made our car cleaning routine way easier.The power cord is 59 inches long and the hose is 78 inches long, which is long enough for us to clean easily.
💨💨【After-Sale Services】The factory offers a three-year warranty on this home steam cleaner.Should you have any query, please do not hesitate to contact us.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: CAYAMA High Presssure Steam Cleaner-Orange This Will Make Your Life Easier! Specifications: Material: ABS Power: 2500W Plug: US 110V Power Cord Length: 59.05inches Steam Pipe Length: 78.74inches Capacity: 1000 Milliliters Product Size: 11.4x 8.4x 8.2 inches Product Weight: 4.54 pounds Attention: Every steam cleaner is tested before leaving the factory, so there will be water marks on the water inlet hose.Please remember to wear matching gloves to prevent burns when using.

High Pressure&High Temperature Steam Cleaner What really sets this steam cleaner apart is the steam humidity adjustment. We can fine-tune it for different surfaces, which is a game-changer. Delicate stuff gets a gentle touch, while tough stains get the full power treatment.

●Round Brush Apply to wall,tabletop,rangehood,etc,which is a large area. ●Plastic Brush Apply to surface for toys,furniture,glass and tiles. ●Steel Brush Apply to metal surface for hearth,cooker,sink,etc. ●Brass Head Apply to most surface which easy to clean.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So far so good. Works great!
reviews.reviewText: This is my third steam cleaner. I got one of the canister ones but that barely made any steam. I got a big wheely boi that failed after one or two uses.This one - this one is not like that. Its compact and small so its not taking up a lot of my closet - huge win! It also heats up and makes a ton of steam after a few uses is still going strong. Its easy to use - just add water, turn on and in minutes you have more steam than you know what to do with.The only downsides are it doesnt have a trigger handle and maybe water volume in the canister since you go through it a lot on the high setting because it works so well.This was, so far, a great purchase and I'm happy with taking the gamble on it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This took away years of dirt and grim buildup. I will say be careful though it is strong enough to strip some paint. Not a big deal for me as I am cleaning to paint. But be warned it stripped to bare wood in some places. Otherwise it is phenomenal. Cleaned grout and entryway. Now.gonna look around the house for other things to clean.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Sort of works
reviews.reviewText: I bought this item for the removal of mold on the grout in the shower. It worked ok. I think I was expecting it to take all the mold off, but it didn't. The water and stream were very hot and I thought it would just remove the mold one time, but I kept having to go back to the same spot again and again. It's just ok. Maybe it was my grout/mold?

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is not a steamer, it’s more like a warm power washer? I was hoping to use something in corners of walls etc but it’s so incredibly wet, you can’t. It just spurts a ton of water out and it’s not even that hot, I’m able to hold my hand up to it. Is mine defective? Confused by the good reviews on this one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This thing is great!Con’s: sometimes the pressure goes low, but it comes right back. I wish it had more accessory options.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent steam cleaner!!
reviews.reviewText: This cleaner really gets the gunk out! I have another smaller handheld steam cleaner I purchased to clean the gunk that builds up in the hard to reach places in the bathroom (glass shower door connections sides and bottoms, drain spouts, etc) and this one does a much better job of getting in the cracks and crevices and steaming out dirt, mold, mildew, etc. And steam is a natural cleaner/disinfectant, so you don’t have to use chemical cleaners. This steam cleaner is very well built with a powerful spray! I plan to use it all over the house inside and out! I Love it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Simplifies your life, cleans fast and easy
reviews.reviewText: My dirty tile grouts were depressing me. When I remembered I needed to kneel and clean them one by one with a toothbrush, I did not even want to start doing it. But with this compact steamer I was able to accomplish it literally in minutes. It lifts dirt fast and effectively, and all you need is just dump the dirt with a rug.The steamer came with a set of accessories, and the loveliest one is a pair of gloves with very soft and nicely felt interior.I am happy with this steamer and can’t wait using it in other projects!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Looking forward to trying it.
reviews.reviewText: Looks sturdy, good reviews, I haven’t tried it yet.
